response.original_title: お願いです、夫には言わないで下さい。～狙われた人妻・恥辱のご近所付き合い～
response.overview: Aimi is a newlywed who is a little frustrated because her husband  can't find time to spend together due to the chaos of moving. She has no choice but to release her pent-up sexual desire by masturbating, but her favorite vibrator breaks, probably because she used it too hard. When she secretly puts it out with the trash, Gondo, the head of the neighborhood association, finds it... Gondo, who has his eye on Aimi's seductive and glamorous body, says, "I'll solve your wife's troubles," and rapes her forcefully. Since then, Aimi's shameful relationship with the men in the neighborhood has begun...
response.tagline: Aimi is a newlywed who is a little frustrated because her husband and she can't find time to spend together due to the chaos of moving leads to a shameful  relationship
response.title: Please don't tell my husband. ~The Married Woman and the Disgraceful Neighborhood Relationship~
